title: 50s script recommendation
content:
Hi,

I'm looking for a script with a 50s feel to it that would work well paired with The Mix for headlines. Any suggestions?
author: Frode Bo Helland

comments.content:
Hi Frode,

Bounce Script is a 50's style script.

Have a nice day,

-Charles

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019055734im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ex_3711.png)

I think that might just work, Charles. Where would I purchase to give you the biggest percentage of the money?
Btw, your ø/Ø's and å/Å's are not very good!
I'll have to check them out. Thanks for the tip!
You didn't answer my question, Charles. Is it all the same?
Myfonts has the best royalty rate for me. Thanks Frode! Sorry ADD stikes again.
